original_title: Flash Health recognized at NBQSA National ICT Awards 2023
original_body_lines: Flash Health, the health technology firm, recently announced its win of the coveted Silver Award at the annual NBQSA National ICT Awards. The award stands as testament to the company’s relentless pursuit of innovation, quality, and commitment to transforming healthcare through technology. Hosted by the National Best Quality Software Awards (NBQSA), the event recognized and celebrated outstanding achievements in the ICT sector. Year after year, the awards have attracted the brightest of the industry, distinguishing companies and products that excel in technical proficiency, user-centric design, and potential global marketability.

Arshad Ameer, CEO of Flash Health said. ” Flash Health’software solutions have been pivotal in streamlining healthcare processes, improving patient outcomes, and ensuring efficient service delivery. With its user-friendly interface and data-driven insights, the platform has already positively impacted thousands of lives, solidifying its place as a trailblazer in the health tech world.”
Embracing IT is no longer a choice but a necessity- President
